title: Disconnects on loading
body: Ever since patch 7.6 I have been unable to connect into games half of the time. League is the only game that gives me this problem but it completely shuts off my  router, and makes it restart. I have no other problems with any games including WoW, HOTS, and Dota 2, has anyone else been having this problem or know a solution? It has caused me to lose quite a few ranked games and if it continues I fear i will not be able to play league anymore.

replies.body: Even though your connection might be fine using other services or games, you can still run into issues reaching specific servers.  In this case, it sounds like an unstable connection might be having trouble reaching and staying connected to our game servers.  To start, you should run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities and troubleshoot.  Test it in a custom and let me know if it helps!
I have tried all solutions except port forwarding as I do not have access to the login on either the router or modem.

Our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) may be able to help.  There's a feature to auto-configure your firewall settings.  I can't guarantee it though if you don't have permission.  Let me know if the tool helps!
No change. Tried an uninstall and reinstall no change either.

In this case, grab the logs from the HRT and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will help individually to find out what's going on.  We'll get back to you there!
This happens to be too! But it only happens when I use the old client, you know the one that doesn't make me wait 5 minutes for the end game screen to load? Yeah that one.
